sentences.en: "I spent all my time craving some green space, something green to look at," she says.
sentences.cn: “我所有的时间都在渴望一些绿色空间，某些看起来绿色的东西，”她说。

sentences.en: A sound of craving and eagerness that had nothing articulate in it but blood.
sentences.cn: 是渴望与急切的喧嚣,喧嚣中除了“血”字之外别的话都听不清.

sentences.en: But the craving for food was growing upon him.
He had dull his craving for verbal truth.
sentences.cn: 他对于口头上的真话的渴求已经淡漠.

sentences.en: He himself , however , is spirited, craving a soul - stirring fight.
sentences.cn: 而他, 仍然向往 、 渴慕着惊心动魄的搏击和奋斗.

sentences.en: I feel a strong craving for a trial with this celebrated gun.
sentences.cn: 我手痒痒的,就要拿这件赫赫有名的枪试验一番.

sentences.en: If you are still craving an illicit food after you exercise, indulge yourself a little.
sentences.cn: 如果在练习之后你仍然渴望不良的食物，那就放纵一下你自己。

sentences.en: People who are truly hooked will go to any lengths to satisfy their craving for the drug.
sentences.cn: 真正吸毒成瘾的人为了满足毒瘾会不择手段.

sentences.en: She followed whither her craving led. She was as yet more drawn than she drew.
sentences.cn: 迄今她被她的欲望牵着跑,被动的时候多于主动的时候.

sentences.en: She skipped normal meals to satisfy her craving for chocolate and crisps.
sentences.cn: 她不吃正餐,以便满足自己吃巧克力和炸薯片的渴望.

sentences.en: The miserable girl had a craving for sympathy.
sentences.cn: 那个可怜的女孩渴望得到同情.

sentences.en: The seller realized this person's craving for a hamburger.
sentences.cn: 销售者了解到这个人急于买到汉堡包.

sentences.en: They are driven by a craving for personal glory.
sentences.cn: 对个人荣誉的渴望驱动着他们.

sentences.en: This can help you satisfy the craving without setting up problems later on.
sentences.cn: 这可以帮你满足欲望，而且事后又不会惹出问题。

sentences.en: This redoubled his craving for her.
We find ourselves not only wanting to be with the person, but also craving that person.
sentences.cn: 会发现我们不仅仅想与对方在一起，还特别渴望得到对方。

sentences.en: You may be craving for some fresh air.
sentences.cn: 你可能很想呼吸呼吸新鲜空气。

trans.tran_en: an extremely strong desire for something

trans.tran_cn: 渴望，热望（ crave的现在分词 ），恳求，请求
